data.title: Dufferin-Peel Catholic District schools in Brampton with reported COVID-19 cases – December 10
data.meta_description: In an effort to keep students and parents updated regarding the spread of COVID-19, the Dufferin-Peel Catholic District School Board (DPCDSB) is tracking the numbers of active confirmed cases at schools within the district
data.text:
In an effort to keep students and parents updated regarding the spread of COVID-19, the Dufferin-Peel Catholic District School Board (DPCDSB) is tracking the numbers of active confirmed cases at schools within the district.

If a student or staff member at a DPCDSB school tests positive for the virus, Public Health will be in contact with the school to provide further direction on when they should return.

Additionally, a deep cleaning of all areas accessed by the person who contracted the virus will take place, and the school will follow the direction of Public Health.

Those who retest negative–after their initial positive test–are permitted to return to school once they are symptom-free for 24 hours.

These are the schools/institutions in Brampton with at least one active reported case of COVID-19 as of December 10, 2020:

Cardinal Ambrozic Catholic Secondary School – 3 confirmed case(s) (1 staff), 2 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Cardinal Leger Secondary School – 2 confirmed case(s), 2 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Father C.W. Sullivan School – 3 confirmed case(s) (1 staff), 1 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Father Clair Tipping School – 1 confirmed case(s), 2 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Father Francis McSpiritt Catholic School – 2 confirmed case(s), 1 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Good Shepherd Catholic Elementary School – 3 confirmed case(s), 3 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Holy Spirit Elementary School – 1 confirmed case(s) (staff), 1 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Edmund Campion Secondary School – 9 confirmed case(s) (1 staff), 2 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Joachim Elementary School – 2 confirmed case(s), 2 closed classroom(s) (school open)

John Henry Newman Catholic Elementary School – 1 confirmed case(s), 1 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Marguerite d’Youville Secondary School – 3 confirmed case(s), 6 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Mary Elementary School – 5 confirmed case(s), 5 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Roch Catholic Secondary School – 1 confirmed case(s), 2 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Thomas Aquinas Secondary School – 1 confirmed case(s), 2 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Venerable Michael J. McGivney Catholic School – 2 confirmed case(s), 1 closed classroom(s) (school open)

Updates will continue as the school year persists.
